sqlMap.select:
SELECT t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.MONITORID as "monitorid", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", t2.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t1.ITEMTIME as "itemtime", t1.ITEMVALUE as "itemvalue", t1.ITEMVALUEZS as "itemvaluezs", t1.ITEMUNIT as "itemunit", t1.ITEMLIMIT as "itemlimit", t1.ITEMMARK as "itemmark", t1.PLANID as "planid", t1.overlimitinfo as "overlimitinfo", t3.departmentid as "departmentid" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALVALUE t1 left join ${hbSchema}.t_ha_factor t2 on t1.FACTORID=t2.FACTORID left join ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALPLAN t3 on t1.PLANID=t3.PLANID WHERE 1=1
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t1.ITEMTIME = #itemtime#
t1.PLANID = #planid#
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID asc, t1.ITEMTIME asc, t1.FACTORID asc

SELECT t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.MONITORID as "monitorid", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", t2.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t1.ITEMTIME as "itemtime", t1.ITEMVALUE as "itemvalue", t1.ITEMVALUEZS as "itemvaluezs", t1.ITEMUNIT as "itemunit", t1.ITEMLIMIT as "itemlimit", t1.ACTTIME as "acttime", t1.ITEMMARK as "itemmark", t1.PLANID as "planid", t1.ISRETEST as "isretest", t1.RETESTTIME as "retesttime", t1.CHECKPERSON as "checkperson", t1.CHECKINFO as "checkinfo", t1.CHECKFLAG as "checkflag", t1.COMPARE as "compare", t1.RETESTMAN as "retestman", t1.RETESTINFO as "retestinfo", t1.ITEMMAN as "itemman", t1.ITEMFILLTIME as "itemfilltime", t3.departmentid as "departmentid", t3.planname as "planname", t4.monitorname as "monitorname", t5.sitename as "sitename" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALVALUE t1 left join ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manfactor t2 on t1.FACTORID=t2.FACTORID left join ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALPLAN t3 on t1.PLANID=t3.PLANID left join ${hbSchema}.t_ha_monitor t4 on t1.monitorid=t4.monitorid left join ${hbSchema}.t_ha_site t5 on t1.siteid=t5.siteid WHERE 1=1
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t1.ITEMTIME = #itemtime#
t1.PLANID = #planid#
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID asc, t1.FACTORID asc, t1.ITEMTIME asc

SELECT
planid as "planid" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALVALUE WHERE 1=1 and planid = #planid# and itemtime = #itemtime# and factorid = #factorid#

SELECT
ITEMTIME as "itemtime" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALVALUE WHERE 1=1
planid = #planid#
order by ITEMTIME desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM .T_HC_MANUALVALUE WHERE 1=1
SITEID = #siteid#
FACTORID = #factorid#
ITEMTIME = #itemtime#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALVALUE (SITEID, MONITORID, FACTORID, ITEMTIME, ITEMVALUE, ITEMVALUEZS, ITEMUNIT, ITEMLIMIT, ITEMMARK, PLANID, createid, createname, createtime, overlimitinfo ) VALUES (#siteid:VARCHAR#, #monitorid:VARCHAR#, #factorid:VARCHAR#, #itemtime:VARCHAR#, #itemvalue:VARCHAR#, #itemvaluezs:VARCHAR#, #itemunit:VARCHAR#, #itemlimit:VARCHAR#, #itemmark:VARCHAR#, #planid:VARCHAR#, #createid:VARCHAR#, #createname:VARCHAR#, #createtime:VARCHAR#, #overlimitinfo:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALVALUE WHERE FACTORID = #factorid# AND ITEMTIME = #itemtime# AND PLANID = #planid#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALVALUE SET ITEMLIMIT = #itemlimit#, ITEMVALUE = #itemvalue#, ITEMVALUEZS = #itemvaluezs#, ITEMUNIT = #itemunit#, ITEMMARK = #itemmark# , updateid = #updateid#, updatename = #updatename#, updatetime = #updatetime#, overlimitinfo = #overlimitinfo# WHERE FACTORID = #factorid# AND ITEMTIME = #itemtime# AND PLANID = #planid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT t3.departmentid as "departmentid", t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.MONITORID as "monitorid", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", t1.ITEMTIME as "itemtime", t1.ITEMVALUE as "itemvalue", t1.ITEMVALUEZS as "itemvaluezs", t1.ITEMUNIT as "itemunit", t1.ITEMLIMIT as "itemlimit", t1.ITEMMARK as "itemmark", t1.PLANID as "planid", t1.overlimitinfo as "overlimitinfo", t2.SITENAME as "sitename", t2.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t3.PLANNAME as "planname", t3.plantype as "plantype" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR t2 on t1.SITEID = t2.SITEID AND t1.FACTORID = t2.FACTORID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALPLAN t3 on t1.PLANID = t3.PLANID WHERE 1=1 AND t2.DATASOURCE='1'
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t1.ITEMTIME = #itemtime#
t3.plantype = #plantype#
t1.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t1.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
t1.MONITORID = #monitorid#
t3.departmentid = #departmentid#
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID asc, t1.ITEMTIME asc, t1.FACTORID asc

SELECT t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.MONITORID as "monitorid", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", t1.ITEMTIME as "itemtime", t1.ITEMVALUE as "itemvalue", t1.ITEMVALUEZS as "itemvaluezs", t1.ITEMUNIT as "itemunit", t1.ITEMLIMIT as "itemlimit", t1.ACTTIME as "acttime", t1.ITEMMARK as "itemmark", t1.PLANID as "planid", t1.ISRETEST as "isretest", t1.RETESTTIME as "retesttime", t1.CHECKPERSON as "checkperson", t1.CHECKINFO as "checkinfo", t1.CHECKFLAG as "checkflag", t1.COMPARE as "compare", t1.RETESTMAN as "retestman", t1.RETESTINFO as "retestinfo", t1.ITEMMAN as "itemman", t1.ITEMFILLTIME as "itemfilltime", t1.overlimitinfo as "overlimitinfo", t2.SITENAME as "sitename", t2.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t2.MONITORNAME as "monitorname", t2.DEPARTMENTID as "departmentid", t3.PLANNAME as "planname", t3.plantype as "plantype" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR t2 on t1.SITEID = t2.SITEID AND t1.FACTORID = t2.FACTORID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALPLAN t3 on t1.PLANID = t3.PLANID LEFT JOIN( SELECT t4.FACTORID AS "FACTORID", max(t4.ITEMVALUE+0) AS "ITEMVALUE" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t4 WHERE 1=1 and t4.ITEMVALUE <>'' and t4.ITEMVALUE is not null
t4.SITEID = #siteid#
t4.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t4.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
GROUP BY (t4.FACTORID)) as t5 ON t1.FACTORID=t5.FACTORID WHERE 1=1 AND t2.DATASOURCE='1' and t1.ITEMVALUE=t5.ITEMVALUE and t1.ITEMVALUE <>'' and t1.ITEMVALUE is not null
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t1.ITEMTIME = #itemtime#
t3.plantype = #plantype#
t1.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t1.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
t1.MONITORID = #monitorid#
t2.DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid#
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID asc, t1.FACTORID asc, t1.ITEMTIME asc

SELECT t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.MONITORID as "monitorid", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", t1.ITEMTIME as "itemtime", t1.ITEMVALUE as "itemvalue", t1.ITEMVALUEZS as "itemvaluezs", t1.ITEMUNIT as "itemunit", t1.ITEMLIMIT as "itemlimit", t1.ACTTIME as "acttime", t1.ITEMMARK as "itemmark", t1.PLANID as "planid", t1.ISRETEST as "isretest", t1.RETESTTIME as "retesttime", t1.CHECKPERSON as "checkperson", t1.CHECKINFO as "checkinfo", t1.CHECKFLAG as "checkflag", t1.COMPARE as "compare", t1.RETESTMAN as "retestman", t1.RETESTINFO as "retestinfo", t1.ITEMMAN as "itemman", t1.ITEMFILLTIME as "itemfilltime", t1.overlimitinfo as "overlimitinfo", t2.SITENAME as "sitename", t2.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t2.MONITORNAME as "monitorname", t2.DEPARTMENTID as "departmentid", t3.PLANNAME as "planname", t3.plantype as "plantype" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR t2 on t1.SITEID = t2.SITEID AND t1.FACTORID = t2.FACTORID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALPLAN t3 on t1.PLANID = t3.PLANID LEFT JOIN( SELECT t4.FACTORID AS "FACTORID", max(t4.ITEMVALUEZS+0) AS "ITEMVALUEZS" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t4 WHERE 1=1 and t4.ITEMVALUEZS <>'' and t4.ITEMVALUEZS is not null
t4.SITEID = #siteid#
t4.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t4.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
GROUP BY (t4.FACTORID)) as t5 ON t1.FACTORID=t5.FACTORID WHERE 1=1 AND t2.DATASOURCE='1' and t1.ITEMVALUEZS=t5.ITEMVALUEZS and t1.ITEMVALUEZS <>'' and t1.ITEMVALUEZS is not null
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t1.ITEMTIME = #itemtime#
t3.plantype = #plantype#
t1.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t1.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
t1.MONITORID = #monitorid#
t2.DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid#
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID asc, t1.FACTORID asc, t1.ITEMTIME asc

SELECT t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.MONITORID as "monitorid", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", t1.ITEMTIME as "itemtime", t1.ITEMVALUE as "itemvalue", t1.ITEMVALUEZS as "itemvaluezs", t1.ITEMUNIT as "itemunit", t1.ITEMLIMIT as "itemlimit", t1.ACTTIME as "acttime", t1.ITEMMARK as "itemmark", t1.PLANID as "planid", t1.ISRETEST as "isretest", t1.RETESTTIME as "retesttime", t1.CHECKPERSON as "checkperson", t1.CHECKINFO as "checkinfo", t1.CHECKFLAG as "checkflag", t1.COMPARE as "compare", t1.RETESTMAN as "retestman", t1.RETESTINFO as "retestinfo", t1.ITEMMAN as "itemman", t1.ITEMFILLTIME as "itemfilltime", t1.overlimitinfo as "overlimitinfo", t2.SITENAME as "sitename", t2.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t2.MONITORNAME as "monitorname", t2.DEPARTMENTID as "departmentid", t3.PLANNAME as "planname", t3.plantype as "plantype" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR t2 on t1.SITEID = t2.SITEID AND t1.FACTORID = t2.FACTORID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALPLAN t3 on t1.PLANID = t3.PLANID LEFT JOIN( SELECT t4.FACTORID AS "FACTORID", MIN(t4.ITEMVALUE+0) AS "ITEMVALUE" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t4 WHERE 1=1 and t4.ITEMVALUE <>'' and t4.ITEMVALUE is not null
t4.SITEID = #siteid#
t4.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t4.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
GROUP BY (t4.FACTORID)) as t5 ON t1.FACTORID=t5.FACTORID WHERE 1=1 AND t2.DATASOURCE='1' and t1.ITEMVALUE=t5.ITEMVALUE and t1.ITEMVALUE <>'' and t1.ITEMVALUE is not null
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t1.ITEMTIME = #itemtime#
t3.plantype = #plantype#
t1.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t1.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
t1.MONITORID = #monitorid#
t2.DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid#
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID asc, t1.FACTORID asc, t1.ITEMTIME asc

SELECT t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.MONITORID as "monitorid", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", t1.ITEMTIME as "itemtime", t1.ITEMVALUE as "itemvalue", t1.ITEMVALUEZS as "itemvaluezs", t1.ITEMUNIT as "itemunit", t1.ITEMLIMIT as "itemlimit", t1.ACTTIME as "acttime", t1.ITEMMARK as "itemmark", t1.PLANID as "planid", t1.ISRETEST as "isretest", t1.RETESTTIME as "retesttime", t1.CHECKPERSON as "checkperson", t1.CHECKINFO as "checkinfo", t1.CHECKFLAG as "checkflag", t1.COMPARE as "compare", t1.RETESTMAN as "retestman", t1.RETESTINFO as "retestinfo", t1.ITEMMAN as "itemman", t1.ITEMFILLTIME as "itemfilltime", t1.overlimitinfo as "overlimitinfo", t2.SITENAME as "sitename", t2.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t2.MONITORNAME as "monitorname", t2.DEPARTMENTID as "departmentid", t3.PLANNAME as "planname", t3.plantype as "plantype" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR t2 on t1.SITEID = t2.SITEID AND t1.FACTORID = t2.FACTORID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALPLAN t3 on t1.PLANID = t3.PLANID LEFT JOIN( SELECT t4.FACTORID AS "FACTORID", MIN(t4.ITEMVALUEZS+0) AS "ITEMVALUEZS" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t4 WHERE 1=1 and t4.ITEMVALUEZS <>'' and t4.ITEMVALUEZS is not null
t4.SITEID = #siteid#
t4.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t4.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
GROUP BY (t4.FACTORID)) as t5 ON t1.FACTORID=t5.FACTORID WHERE 1=1 AND t2.DATASOURCE='1' and t1.ITEMVALUEZS=t5.ITEMVALUEZS and t1.ITEMVALUEZS <>'' and t1.ITEMVALUEZS is not null
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t1.ITEMTIME = #itemtime#
t3.plantype = #plantype#
t1.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t1.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
t1.MONITORID = #monitorid#
t2.DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid#
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID asc, t1.FACTORID asc, t1.ITEMTIME asc

SELECT t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", avg(t1.ITEMVALUE) as "itemvalue",
t1.ITEMUNIT as "itemunit", t1.ITEMLIMIT as "itemlimit", t2.SITENAME as "sitename", t2.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t3.PLANNAME as "planname" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR t2 on t1.SITEID = t2.SITEID AND t1.FACTORID = t2.FACTORID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALPLAN t3 on t1.PLANID = t3.PLANID WHERE 1=1 AND t2.DATASOURCE='1' and t1.ITEMVALUE <>'' and t1.ITEMVALUE is not null
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t3.plantype = #plantype#
t1.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t1.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
t1.MONITORID = #monitorid#
t2.DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid#
group by (t1.SITEID,t1.FACTORID,t1.ITEMUNIT,t1.ITEMLIMIT,t2.SITENAME,t2.FACTORNAME, t3.PLANNAME)
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID asc, t1.FACTORID asc

SELECT t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.FACTORID as "factorid",
avg(t1.ITEMVALUEZS) as "itemvaluezs", t1.ITEMUNIT as "itemunit", t1.ITEMLIMIT as "itemlimit", t2.SITENAME as "sitename", t2.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t3.PLANNAME as "planname" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR t2 on t1.SITEID = t2.SITEID AND t1.FACTORID = t2.FACTORID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALPLAN t3 on t1.PLANID = t3.PLANID WHERE 1=1 AND t2.DATASOURCE='1' and t1.ITEMVALUEZS <>'' and t1.ITEMVALUEZS is not null
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t3.plantype = #plantype#
t1.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t1.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
t1.MONITORID = #monitorid#
t2.DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid#
group by (t1.SITEID,t1.FACTORID,t1.ITEMUNIT,t1.ITEMLIMIT,t2.SITENAME,t2.FACTORNAME, t3.PLANNAME)
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID asc, t1.FACTORID asc

SELECT SITEID as "siteid", SITENAME as "sitename", PORTID as "portid", ISARTIFICIAL as "isartificial", ISONLINE as "isonline", CLASSIFYID as "classifyid", MONITORID as "monitorid", MNID as "mnid", DESCRIPTION as "description", SORT as "sort", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_ha_site WHERE 1=1
SITEID = #siteid#
ISARTIFICIAL = #isartificial#
ISONLINE = #isonline#
STATUS = #status#
CLASSIFYID = #classifyid#
MONITORID = #monitorid#
$orderBy$
SITEID asc

SELECT t2.FACTORID as "factorid", t2.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t2.UNIT as "unit", t2.DESCRIPTION as "description" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_ha_sitefactor t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.t_ha_factor t2 on t1.FACTORID = t2.FACTORID WHERE 1=1
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.TYPE = #type#
t1.STATUS = #status#
$orderBy$
t1.FACTORID asc
$sqlMap$

SELECT * FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t4 WHERE 1=1 and t4.ITEMVALUE <>'' and t4.ITEMVALUE is not null
t4.SITEID = #siteid#
t4.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t4.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#

SELECT * FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t4 WHERE 1=1 and t4.ITEMVALUEZS <>'' and t4.ITEMVALUEZS is not null
t4.SITEID = #siteid#
t4.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t4.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#

SELECT t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.MONITORID as "monitorid", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", t1.ITEMTIME as "itemtime", t1.ITEMVALUE as "itemvalue", t1.ITEMVALUEZS as "itemvaluezs", t1.ITEMUNIT as "itemunit", t1.ITEMLIMIT as "itemlimit", t1.ACTTIME as "acttime", t1.ITEMMARK as "itemmark", t1.PLANID as "planid", t1.ISRETEST as "isretest", t1.RETESTTIME as "retesttime", t1.CHECKPERSON as "checkperson", t1.CHECKINFO as "checkinfo", t1.CHECKFLAG as "checkflag", t1.COMPARE as "compare", t1.RETESTMAN as "retestman", t1.RETESTINFO as "retestinfo", t1.ITEMMAN as "itemman", t1.ITEMFILLTIME as "itemfilltime", t1.overlimitinfo as "overlimitinfo", t2.SITENAME as "sitename", t2.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t2.MONITORNAME as "monitorname", t2.DEPARTMENTID as "departmentid", t3.PLANNAME as "planname", t3.plantype as "plantype" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR t2 on t1.SITEID = t2.SITEID AND t1.FACTORID = t2.FACTORID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALPLAN t3 on t1.PLANID = t3.PLANID WHERE 1=1 AND t2.DATASOURCE='1' and t1.ITEMVALUE <>'' and t1.ITEMVALUE is not null
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t1.ITEMTIME = #itemtime#
t3.plantype = #plantype#
t1.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t1.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
t1.MONITORID = #monitorid#
t2.DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid#
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID asc, t1.FACTORID asc, t1.ITEMTIME asc

SELECT t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", t1.ITEMUNIT as "itemunit", t2.SITENAME as "sitename", t2.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t3.PLANNAME as "planname" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR t2 on t1.SITEID = t2.SITEID AND t1.FACTORID = t2.FACTORID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALPLAN t3 on t1.PLANID = t3.PLANID WHERE 1=1 AND t2.DATASOURCE='1' and t1.ITEMVALUE <>'' and t1.ITEMVALUE is not null
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t3.plantype = #plantype#
t1.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t1.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
t1.MONITORID = #monitorid#
t2.DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid#
group by (t1.SITEID,t1.FACTORID,t1.ITEMUNIT,t2.SITENAME,t2.FACTORNAME, t3.PLANNAME)
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID asc, t1.FACTORID asc

SELECT t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", t1.ITEMVALUE AS "itemvalue", t1.ITEMUNIT as "itemunit", t2.SITENAME as "sitename", t2.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t3.PLANNAME as "planname" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR t2 on t1.SITEID = t2.SITEID AND t1.FACTORID = t2.FACTORID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALPLAN t3 on t1.PLANID = t3.PLANID WHERE 1=1 AND t2.DATASOURCE='1' and t1.ITEMVALUE <>'' and t1.ITEMVALUE is not null
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t3.plantype = #plantype#
t1.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t1.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
t1.MONITORID = #monitorid#
t2.DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid#
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID asc, t1.FACTORID asc

SELECT t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", t1.ITEMVALUEZS AS "itemvaluezs", t1.ITEMUNIT as "itemunit", t2.SITENAME as "sitename", t2.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t3.PLANNAME as "planname" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR t2 on t1.SITEID = t2.SITEID AND t1.FACTORID = t2.FACTORID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALPLAN t3 on t1.PLANID = t3.PLANID WHERE 1=1 AND t2.DATASOURCE='1' and t1.ITEMVALUE <>'' and t1.ITEMVALUE is not null
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t3.plantype = #plantype#
t1.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t1.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
t1.MONITORID = #monitorid#
t2.DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid#
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID asc, t1.FACTORID asc

SELECT t1.FACTORID AS "factorid" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hc_manualvalue t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE_FACTOR t2 on t1.SITEID = t2.SITEID AND t1.FACTORID = t2.FACTORID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HC_MANUALPLAN t3 on t1.PLANID = t3.PLANID WHERE 1=1 AND t2.DATASOURCE='1' and t1.ITEMVALUE <>'' and t1.ITEMVALUE is not null
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.FACTORID = #factorid#
t3.plantype = #plantype#
t1.ITEMTIME >= #startdate#
t1.ITEMTIME <= #enddate#
t1.MONITORID = #monitorid#
t2.DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid#
GROUP BY t1.FACTORID
